psychotherapy.title: Psychotherapy
psychotherapy.body: A long-term process that helps you gain deeper self-awareness, recognize behavioral patterns, and change them.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.body: Short-term support focused on solving specific problems. Helps to overcome crisis situations.

session-reservation.title: Session reservation
session-reservation.body: A convenient way to book your first or follow-up appointment online. Consultations take place in a cozy setting.
